properties.name: spring.cloud.polaris.config.enabled
properties.description: The switch of polaris configuration module.

properties.name: spring.cloud.polaris.config.auto-refresh
properties.description: Whether to automatically update to the spring context when the configuration file is updated.

properties.name: spring.cloud.polaris.config.connect-remote-server
properties.description: Whether to connect to a remote server, suitable for local development mode.

properties.name: spring.cloud.polaris.config.refresh-type
properties.description: Attribute refresh type when config updated. refresh_context or reflect.

properties.name: spring.cloud.polaris.config.shutdown-if-connect-to-config-server-failed
properties.description: Whether shutdown server if connect to config server failed.
